name: fe_03_01508
context_text: <B> and so after it happened my roommate at the time told me about it and she um nobody really was relating to what actually happened we were all just kinda like okay you know maybe like when that bomb went off like back in the early nineties / <A> right / <B> we all kinda thought it was something like that { and } / <A> [ right ] / <B> she eventually was like no it's not there any more you know it's gone and it pretty much hit me in the sense though it was really it was just kinda like something that was surreal and you really had to think closely of who was the most important people in your life because you don't know { when } / <A> [ right ] / <B> they're gone just as you know you would have that decision to have to make about your son and and it is like decisions where you had to put more thought into things so / <A> right
